laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Hematocrit decreased from 34.5% 1 year earlier to 26.8%.

findings.blood_urea_nitrogen: 44 mg per deciliter (16 mmol per liter)
findings.creatinine: 1.28 mg per deciliter (113.2 µmol per liter)
findings.glucose: 104 mg per deciliter (5.8 mmol per liter)
findings.calcium: 6.5 mg per deciliter (1.6 mmol per liter)
findings.iron: 13 µg per deciliter (2.3 µmol per liter)
findings.total_iron_binding_capacity: 353 µg per deciliter (63 µmol per liter)

findings.zinc: 28 µg per deciliter (normal range, 60 to 120 µg per deciliter)

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Zinc, vitamin D, and calcium levels all normalized later.

findings.biopsy_stomach_and_duodenum: Negative for cancer, celiac disease, Whipple’s disease, eosinophilic gastroenteritis; evidence of chronic active gastritis.

laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Presence of prominent folds and polypoid formation noted upon repeat endoscopy.
